actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to the offering of prayer in any public place or conveyance.

summary.text: Constitutional amendment - Provides that nothing contained in the Constitutional shall abridge the right of persons lawfully assembled in any public place or conveyance which is supported in whole or in part through the expenditure of public funds, to participate voluntarily in the free exercise of prayer.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to the offering of prayer in any public place or conveyance.
